About me
My Albums

Search Likes
Google Map

Functionalities:

• Search flick photos using the serch bar

• Retreives facebook info and displays it

• Retreives facebook Albums and photos

• Retreives facebook Likes (and may choose a random like to perform a search)

• Simple google map API which only displays a map


Web API being Used:

• Flickr

• Facebook

• Google Maps


Log in and log out with facecbook, Permission needed:

• email, posts, likes, friends, gender, photos
